verses.verse: לדוד <WH1732> of David. ריבה <WH7378> Plead יהוה <WH3068> O LORD, את <WH853> יריבי <WH3401> them that strive לחם <WH3898> with me: fight against את <WH853> לחמי׃ <WH3898> them that fight against
החזק <WH2388> Take hold מגן <WH4043> of shield וצנה <WH6793> and buckler, וקומה <WH6965> and stand up בעזרתי׃ <WH5833> for mine help.

והרק <WH7324> Draw out חנית <WH2595> also the spear, וסגר <WH5462> and stop לקראת <WH7125> against רדפי <WH7291> them that persecute אמר <WH559> me: say לנפשׁי <WH5315> unto my soul, ישׁעתך <WH3444> thy salvation. אני׃ <WH589> I

יבשׁו <WH954> Let them be confounded ויכלמו <WH3637> and put to shame מבקשׁי <WH1245> that seek after נפשׁי <WH5315> my soul: יסגו <WH5472> let them be turned אחור <WH268> back ויחפרו <WH2659> and brought to confusion חשׁבי <WH2803> that devise רעתי׃ <WH7451> my hurt.
יהיו <WH1961> Let them be כמץ <WH4671> as chaff לפני <WH6440> before רוח <WH7307> the wind: ומלאך <WH4397> and let the angel יהוה <WH3068> of the LORD דוחה׃ <WH1760> chase
יהי <WH1961> be דרכם <WH1870> Let their way חשׁך <WH2822> dark וחלקלקות <WH2519> and slippery: ומלאך <WH4397> and let the angel יהוה <WH3068> of the LORD רדפם׃ <WH7291> persecute

כי <WH3588> For חנם <WH2600> without cause טמנו <WH2934> have they hid לי שׁחת <WH7845> a pit, רשׁתם <WH7568> for me their net חנם <WH2600> without cause חפרו <WH2658> they have digged לנפשׁי׃ <WH5315> for my soul.

תבואהו <WH935> come upon שׁואה <WH7722> Let destruction לא <WH3808> him at unawares; ידע <WH3045> him at unawares; ורשׁתו <WH7568> and let his net אשׁר <WH834> that טמן <WH2934> he hath hid תלכדו <WH3920> catch בשׁואה <WH7722> himself: into that very destruction יפל׃ <WH5307> let him fall.
ונפשׁי <WH5315> And my soul תגיל <WH1523> shall be joyful ביהוה <WH3068> in the LORD: תשׂישׂ <WH7797> it shall rejoice בישׁועתו׃ <WH3444> in his salvation.

כל <WH3605> All עצמותי <WH6106> my bones תאמרנה <WH559> shall say, יהוה <WH3068> LORD, מי <WH4310> who כמוך <WH3644> like unto thee, מציל <WH5337> which deliverest עני <WH6041> the poor מחזק <WH2389> from him that is too strong ממנו <WH4480> from him that is too strong ועני <WH6041> him, yea, the poor ואביון <WH34> and the needy מגזלו׃ <WH1497> from him that spoileth
יקומון <WH6965> did rise up; עדי <WH5707> witnesses חמס <WH2555> False אשׁר <WH834> that לא <WH3808> not. ידעתי <WH3045> I knew ישׁאלוני׃ <WH7592> they laid to my charge
ישׁלמוני <WH7999> They rewarded רעה <WH7451> me evil תחת <WH8478> for טובה <WH2896> good שׁכול <WH7908> the spoiling לנפשׁי׃ <WH5315> of my soul.

ואני <WH589> But as for me, בחלותם <WH2470> when they were sick, לבושׁי <WH3830> my clothing שׂק <WH8242> sackcloth: עניתי <WH6031> I humbled בצום <WH6685> with fasting; נפשׁי <WH5315> my soul ותפלתי <WH8605> and my prayer על <WH5921> into חיקי <WH2436> mine own bosom. תשׁוב׃ <WH7725> returned
כרע <WH7453> as though my friend כאח <WH251> brother: לי התהלכתי <WH1980> I behaved myself כאבל <WH57> as one that mourneth אם <WH517> mother. קדר <WH6937> heavily, שׁחותי׃ <WH7817> I bowed down

ובצלעי <WH6761> But in mine adversity שׂמחו <WH8055> they rejoiced, ונאספו <WH622> and gathered themselves together: נאספו <WH622> gathered themselves together עלי <WH5921> against נכים <WH5222> the abjects ולא <WH3808> not; ידעתי <WH3045> me, and I knew קרעו <WH7167> they did tear ולא <WH3808> not: דמו׃ <WH1826> and ceased
בחנפי <WH2611> With hypocritical לעגי <WH3934> mockers מעוג <WH4580> in feasts, חרק <WH2786> they gnashed עלי <WH5921> upon שׁנימו׃ <WH8127> me with their teeth.

אדני <WH136> Lord, כמה <WH4100> how long תראה <WH7200> wilt thou look on? השׁיבה <WH7725> rescue נפשׁי <WH5315> my soul משׁאיהם <WH7722> from their destructions, מכפירים <WH3715> from the lions. יחידתי׃ <WH3173> my darling
אודך <WH3034> I will give thee thanks בקהל <WH6951> congregation: רב <WH7227> in the great בעם <WH5971> people. עצום <WH6099> thee among much אהללך׃ <WH1984> I will praise

אל <WH408> Let not ישׂמחו <WH8055> rejoice לי איבי <WH341> them that are mine enemies שׁקר <WH8267> wrongfully שׂנאי <WH8130> that hate חנם <WH2600> me without a cause. יקרצו <WH7169> over me: let them wink עין׃ <WH5869> with the eye

כי <WH3588> For לא <WH3808> not שׁלום <WH7965> peace: ידברו <WH1696> they speak ועל <WH5921> against רגעי <WH7282> quiet ארץ <WH776> in the land. דברי <WH1697> matters מרמות <WH4820> deceitful יחשׁבון׃ <WH2803> but they devise
וירחיבו <WH7337> Yea, they opened עלי <WH5921> wide against פיהם <WH6310> their mouth אמרו <WH559> me, said, האח <WH1889> Aha, האח <WH1889> aha, ראתה <WH7200> hath seen עינינו׃ <WH5869> our eye
ראיתה <WH7200> thou hast seen, יהוה <WH3068> O LORD: אל <WH408> keep not תחרשׁ <WH2790> silence: אדני <WH136> O Lord, אל <WH408> be not תרחק <WH7368> far ממני׃ <WH4480> from
העירה <WH5782> Stir up thyself, והקיצה <WH6974> and awake למשׁפטי <WH4941> to my judgment, אלהי <WH430> my God ואדני <WH136> and my Lord. לריבי׃ <WH7379> unto my cause,
שׁפטני <WH8199> Judge כצדקך <WH6664> according to thy righteousness; יהוה <WH3068> me, O LORD אלהי <WH430> my God, ואל <WH408> and let them not ישׂמחו׃ <WH8055> rejoice

אל <WH408> Let them not יאמרו <WH559> say בלבם <WH3820> in their hearts, האח <WH1889> Ah, נפשׁנו <WH5315> so would we have it: אל <WH408> let them not יאמרו <WH559> say, בלענוהו׃ <WH1104> We have swallowed him up.

יבשׁו <WH954> Let them be ashamed ויחפרו <WH2659> and brought to confusion יחדו <WH3162> together שׂמחי <WH8056> that rejoice רעתי <WH7451> at mine hurt: ילבשׁו <WH3847> let them be clothed בשׁת <WH1322> with shame וכלמה <WH3639> and dishonor המגדילים <WH1431> that magnify עלי׃ <WH5921> against

ירנו <WH7442> Let them shout for joy, וישׂמחו <WH8055> and be glad, חפצי <WH2655> that favor צדקי <WH6664> my righteous cause: ויאמרו <WH559> yea, let them say תמיד <WH8548> continually, יגדל <WH1431> be magnified, יהוה <WH3068> Let the LORD החפץ <WH2655> which hath pleasure שׁלום <WH7965> in the prosperity עבדו׃ <WH5650> of his servant.
ולשׁוני <WH3956> And my tongue תהגה <WH1897> shall speak צדקך <WH6664> of thy righteousness כל <WH3605> all היום <WH3117> the day תהלתך׃ <WH8416> of thy praise
